value.string:
PreRequisites:::
1.ODBC Drivers Need to be installed in the Bot Running  Machine.
2.Config File should be Placed in below Folder
-->C:\RPAProcesses\Carhartt AR_Mass_Invoice_Upload\Config\Config.xml
select Distinct [PONumber] from [Input$] where [Status]  IS NULL
Login SAP Screen Not Exist-Calling SAP Login Task -Started
Login SAP Screen Not Exist-Calling SAP Login Task -Ended

value.expression: select * from [Input$$] where [PONumber]='$vPONumbers[0]$' and [Status]  IS NULL
update [Input$$] set [StartTime]='$vStrStartTime$' where [PONumber]='$vPONumbers[0]$' and [Status]  IS NULL

value.string: SAP ACCESS Window Not Exist Updating in DataBase
CMT Consumption of Components window Not Exist

value.expression: update [Input$$] set [Status]='Not Posted' ,[EndTime]='$vStrEndTime$',[ErrorMessage]='$vStrInvalidPO$' where [PONumber]='$vPONumbers[0]$' and [Status]  IS NULL

value.string: CMT Consumption of Components window Not Exist
Consumption of Components in CMT PO
Consumption of Components in CMT PO

value.expression: update [Input$$] set [Status]='AlreadyValuesExistForthePO' ,[EndTime]='$vStrEndTime$',[ErrorMessage]='UserHavetoCrossCheckthePO' where [PONumber]='$vPONumbers[0]$' and [Status]  IS NULL

ExecutionData--$SQLDatasetRow[0]$
StartTime-------$SQLDatasetRow[1]$
End Time-------$SQLDatasetRow[2]$
PoNumber------$SQLDatasetRow[3]$
Component-----$SQLDatasetRow[4]$
Bale------------$SQLDatasetRow[5]$
QtyUsed--------$SQLDatasetRow[6]$

value.string: Getting Error Message value from SAP

value.expression: Error Message for the BatchNumber-[$vStrComponentNumber$] is  Blank
update [Input$$] set [ErrorMessage]='$vStrComponentErrorMessage$' where [BatchNumber]='$vStrComponentNumber$'  and [PONumber]='$vPONumbers[0]$' and  [Status]  IS NULL

value.string: Getting Table Text from Increemnted Value

value.expression: update [Input$$] set [ErrorMessage]='$vQtyDiffTableErrorMessage$', [ConsumedQTYDifferene]='$vQtyDiffTablePercentage$',[ColorCoding]='$vQtyTableErrorMessageComponent$' where [ComponentCode]='$vQtyDiffTableComponent$'  and [PONumber]='$vPONumbers[0]$' and [Status]  IS NULL

value.string: Deficit of Stock w. vendor unr. 4,442.000- EA :

value.expression: update [Input$$] set [ErrorMessage]='$vStrInformationMsg$' where [PONumber]='$vPONumbers[0]$' and  [Status]  IS NULL
update [Input$$] set [ErrorMessage]='$vSAPStatusBARMessage$' where [PONumber]='$vPONumbers[0]$' and  [Status]  IS NULL
Updating to Database if $vSAPStatusBARMessage$ includes Goods has been already issued
update [Input$$] set [ErrorMessage]='$vSAPStatusBARMessage$' where [PONumber]='$vPONumbers[0]$' and  [Status]  IS NULL

value.expression: update [Input$$] set [MaterialDocument]='$vSapMaterialDocument$',[PostingDate]='$vSAPPostingDate$' where [PONumber]='$vPONumbers[0]$' and  [Status]  IS NULL
update [Input$$] set [Status]='Data Posted' ,[EndTime]='$vStrEndTime$'where [PONumber]='$vPONumbers[0]$' and [Status]  IS NULL
